organizations.name: DiploFoundation
quotes: Jovan Kurbalija is the Founding Director of the DiploFoundation.
This unit later evolved into the DiploFoundation.

He is currently a faculty member at DiploFoundation and directs online learning courses on ICT and diplomacy and lectures in academic and training institutions in Switzerland, the United States, Austria, the United Kingdom, the Netherlands and Malta.

organizations.name: Mediterranean Academy of Diplomatic Studies
quotes: This interest led him to establish the Unit for IT and Diplomacy at the Mediterranean Academy of Diplomatic Studies in Malta.

quotes: Jovan has attended WSIS.

organizations.name: ICANN
quotes: Jovan has attended ICANN's President's Strategy Committee Consultations Teleconference.

organizations.name: INET
quotes: He was a presentator at the INET Africa Regional Conference Cairo, Egypt.

organizations.name: IGF
quotes: He also attends IGF conferences.
